column4: Is it possible to install windows on a computer running ubuntu?
im confused though, can anyone help?
you can, but windows will overwrite your mbr.. that means you will have to install grub again
do you want to delete linux completely?
did you create an extra partition for win?
so you want to keep ubuntu and install windows, right?
ok then you have to create "place" on your hard disk for win
in other words youll have to create a partition
at fiirst you would need top backup your files
becuse resizing partitions is allways risky
thats a tool for resizing partition
you told you want keep ubuntu?
then just start your windows cd, and choose delete partitions
put your wincd into your drive and reboot pc
and make sure in bios, thta your machine tries to start from cd-rom first
